mapper.insert: insert into employee (name, password, email, age, admin, dept_id) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{age}, #{admin}, #{dept_id})
mapper.update: update employee set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, age = #{age}, admin = #{admin}, dept_id = #{dept_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, email, age, admin, dept_id from employee
